title: University Feedback System
description: This application centralizes student feedback on university aspects, offering anonymous or named contributions with authentication via college email. It ensures a secure environment, streamlines feedback collection, and enhances the university experience by eliminating multiple Google forms.

title: Spoonacular
description: This text-based recipe application focuses on Indian cuisine, offering a rich database of diverse recipes. Users can effortlessly browse and access a variety of recipes, each detailed with ingredients and instructions. The app features a feedback system, allowing users to provide input without mandatory sign-ups.

title: Forumify
description: A coding discussion platform where users can start discussions, post replies, and comment across various programming topics, all while ensuring secure participation through user authentication and managing data with a PHPMyAdmin database. It also features robust search functionality for easy access to relevant information.
